Package craterdog.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageDecryption
    This interface defines the methods needed to do message level symmetric key decryption when the sender and receiver have already exchanged their asymmetric public keys.
    MessageEncryption
    This interface defines the methods needed to do message level symmetric key encryption when the sender and receiver have already exchanged their asymmetric public keys.
    Notarization
    This interface defines the methods that must be implemented by all based digital notaries.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CertificateAuthorityGenerator
    This class provides a tool for generating new private certificate authorities.
    CertificateManager
    This class provides methods that hide the complexities of the Java security API in dealing with certificate management.
    ClientCertificateGenerator
    This class provides a tool for generating and signing new client certificates using a private certificate authority.
    ClientCertificateSigner
    This class provides a tool for generating new client certificates using a private certificate authority.
    DigitalSeal
    This class defines the attributes that make up an digital seal that is used to sign a document.
    EncryptedPropertyConfigurer
    This class overrides the functionality of the Spring framework's PropertyPlaceHolderConfigurer class to handle encrypted properties.
    MessageCryptex
    This abstract class defines constants and implements invariant methods that are needed by all concrete classes that implement message encryption and decryption.
    NotaryKey
    This class defines the attributes associated with a notary key.
    PropertyEncryptor
    This class provides a tool for encrypting configuration properties.
    RsaAesMessageCryptex
    This class implements the interfaces needed to do message level symmetric key encryption and decryption when the sender and receiver have already exchanged their asymmetric public keys.
    RsaCertificateManager
    This class provides an RSA specific implementation of the CertificateManager abstract class.
    RsaDigitalNotary
    This class can be used to sign and verify digital notarized documents using a private/public key pair.
    Watermark
    This class defines the attributes that make up a watermark that defines the lifetime of a document and the version of the signing algorithm used to sign it.
